title: Ending season with negative LP
body: So i was on a losing streak and got down to 0 LP gold 5. So i stopped playing in fear of losing and getting demoted before the season ends. However i checked my profile a few days later and it said -3 LP. Will it still give me the Gold 5 rating at the end? Or will it give me silver?

replies.body: As long as you are still Gold at the end of the season you'll get rewards for being in Gold even if you have -LP.

Having negative or 0 LP at the end won't demote you! You should feel free to stop playing in that queue, since *actively losing* games at 0 or negative LP could cause you to drop! If you stop now, you should get Gold ^_^
